Description: Marshall Residential Hall check-in at the ERC Conference Dask and move-in to your assigned rooms in Marshall Residential Hall N, O, or S. (see [Residential Life] {residential.html} for more information)
Have lunch on your own and walk to the CSE Building (EBU 3B) for the SPIS Welcome Reception
SPIS Welcome Reception. Light refreshments will be served (Room 1202, CSE Building)

SPIS Welcome Ceremony. UC San Diego faculty welcome the students and parents (Room 1202, CSE Building)
\\Welcoming team:\\
* John Moore, Professor and Dean of Undergraduate Education
* Christine Alvarado, CSE Faculty and Associate Dean for Students, Jacobs School of Engineering
* SPIS faculty, staff, and mentors
SPIS students, faculty, and mentors stay for arrival activities (Room CSE 1202, CSE Building)
SPIS students return to Marshall Residential Halls to unpack and settle in
